title: Diva
creator_credit: Jean-Jacques Beineix, Irene Silberman and Galaxie
brief_description: A music-loving mailman bootleg-tapes the concert of a superstar diva who has never made a recording. He finds himself in hot water when the tape is mixed up with a second tape that will incriminate gangsters. Based on a novel by Delacorta and starring Wilhemina Wiggins-Fernandez as the diva.
